definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: For example, an electronic book for $30 could be sold to your prospects.
sentences.chinese: 例如，電子書籍可以出售給你30元的前景。

sentences.english: I did this recently with an ebook and got a lot done.
sentences.chinese: 最近我就用這樣的方作完成了一本電子書的製作。

sentences.english: All the other eReaders will be substantially more expensive, with the cheapest Kindle clocking in at $299.
sentences.chinese: 其他電子書閱讀器都要貴得多。

sentences.english: Ebooks are very easy to to sell and distribute.
sentences.chinese: 電子書容易出售也容易傳播。

sentences.english: Google will host the e-books and make them searchable.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌將成爲電子書的主人，使它們可供搜索。

sentences.english: Some parents do not want to make the switch for even their school-age children.
sentences.chinese: 有些家長甚至不願讓開始上學的孩子換成電子書。

sentences.english: Google's eBooks is a Cloud service.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌電子書是一項雲服務。

sentences.english: Then they make an ebook to bilk even more money from the technique .
sentences.chinese: 然後他們做出電子書，以詐騙甚至更多的錢，從技術。

sentences.english: But, right " electronic book " show capture to did not make clear a regulation however.
sentences.chinese: 但是，對“電子書”的呈繳卻沒有明確規定。

sentences.english: Please get your copy of Leo’s minimalist ebook here.
sentences.chinese: 請在這裏利歐的極簡主義電子書的復件。

sentences.english: Ebooks have loads of demerits, especially as they are marketed to libraries.
sentences.chinese: 電子書有很多缺點，特別是被賣給圖書館時。

sentences.english: Now e-books threaten to undermine sales of the old-fashioned kind.
sentences.chinese: 現在電子書籍正威脅到傳統意義上的書籍銷售量。

sentences.english: oUsers also want to annotate e-books and other documents.
sentences.chinese: 用戶還希望給電子書和其他文檔加註。

sentences.english: Today, Amazon sells more e-books than paperbacks.
sentences.chinese: 今天，亞馬遜賣出的電子書比紙質書可要多。

sentences.english: Electronicbooks are a wonderful adjunct toprint books.
sentences.chinese: 電子書籍是印刷書籍的美好的輔助品。

sentences.english: I need highly converting squeeze page design for my latest e-book selling offer.
sentences.chinese: 我需要我的最新高度電子書賣盤轉換擠壓頁面設計。

definition: paper/hard copy/printed (as opposed to electronically displayed)
to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
